description: This is a Request For Proposal (RFP) for food services digital sales technology. Please see the solicitation 2023016 on Merx for additional information and documents.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### FOOD SERVICES – DIGITAL SALES TECHNOLOGY

#### Tender Reference Number: cb-7904-1182648

This is an amendment to the original announcement of solicitation number 2023016, published on August 4, 2023.

#### Tender Closing Date:
The tender closing date is August 31, 2023, at 14:00:00.

#### Amendments:
This tender has been amended on August 31, 2023.

#### Status:
The tender is expired.

#### Goods and Services Information
#### UNSPSC Codes
* 23180000 - Industrial food and beverage equipment
* 43230000 - Software
* 48100000 - Institutional food services equipment
* 85150000 - Food and nutrition services
* 85151700 - Food policy planning and aid
* 90100000 - Restaurants and catering
* 90101700 - Cafeteria services
* 90101800 - Carryout and takeaway services

#### Procurement Category:
SRVTGD

#### Notice Type:
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Procurement Method:
Competitive - Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria:
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Trade Agreements:
Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents for more information on applicable trade agreements.

#### Regions of Opportunity:
Ottawa

#### Regions of Delivery:
National Capital Region (NCR), Canada, and Ottawa

#### Contracting Authority:
House of Commons, 50 O'Connor, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0A6, Canada

#### Contact Information:
Patricia Renaud
Email: [patricia.renaud@parl.gc.ca](mailto:patricia.renaud@parl.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-992-0920
Note: All inquiries regarding this tender should be addressed to the designated contact person.

[Tender Description in English and French]:
The House of Commons is inviting prospective Bidders to submit proposals for the provision of Food Services – Digital Sales Technology. Please see Solicitation 2023016 posted on Merx for additional information and documents.

La Chambre des communes invite tous les soumissionnaires éventuels à présenter une proposition pour la prestation de services de restauration – Technologie de vente en ligne.
